A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing.  Visually stunning but full of plot holes and discontinuities.  Poor writing that continually surprises the viewer by disappointing with most questions answered by saying it means nothing.  Little to no development of back stories.  Rey unrealistically perfect and has no room to grow\, which creates no connection by the viewer.  I've enjoyed all of the expanded universe books\, games etc.  This is the most disappointing contribution to Star Wars since the holiday special.
